answerText: aphasia[10] The temporal lobe can sometimes herniate through the tentorium, causing this to happen to the pupil of the eye on the affected side. This condition is formally called mydriasis, and can also be caused by anti-cholinergics.

subject: Science
question: Question: Identify some things about disorders that occur upon damage to the temporal lobe. [10] The variant of this disease named for Wernicke is often caused by temporal lobe lesions. This condition is the inability to properly use language.
